title: Home Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps: WHEN a user is on the homepage
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see
-Header with Menu button
-Header with Remote label
-Current layout of the room (super wall active or not)
-Super Wall button

title: Menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps on the Menu button
custom_expected:
THEN the menu will appear from the left
AND the user will see Remote button
AND Displays button
AND Display Manager button
AND Power button

title: Menu - Remote
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
custom_steps:
WHEN a user navigates to another screen
AND taps on menu button
and taps on Remote
custom_expected: THEN the user will be taken to the homepage

title: Menu - Displays
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user has the menu exposed
AND taps on Display
custom_expected:
THEN a sub menu is displayed for each row of the screen in the BCC
Top (w/ arrow)
Middle (w/o arrow)
Bottom (w/ arrow)

title: Menu - Displays Sub Menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user has the Display menu exposed
AND a user taps on Top or Bottom
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a sub menu
AND see Left, Center, Right

title: Menu - Display Manager
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user has the Menu exposed
AND taps on the Display Manger
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the Display Manager screen

title: Menu - Power
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps: WHEN a user has the menu exposed
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a Power button and icon

title: Menu - Power Off
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
AND the screen(s) are on
custom_steps:
WHEN a user has the menu exposed
AND taps on Power
custom_expected:
THEN the monitors will power down
AND the Remote button will be disabled
AND the Displays (and sub menu buttons) will be disabled
AND the Display Manager button will be disabled
AND the Power will be enabled
AND the user will see a Please power on the monitor wall message

title: Menu - Power On
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
AND the screen(s) are off
custom_steps:
WHEN a user has the menu exposed
AND taps on Power
custom_expected:
THEN the monitors will power on
AND the Remote button will be enabled
AND the Displays button (and sub menu buttons) will be enabled
AND the Display Manager button will be enabled
AND the Power button will be enabled

title: Super Wall - Not Active
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user has all PIP displayed
AND taps on the Super Wall button
custom_expected:
THEN the button will be disabled for a short time
AND the button text will change to Exit Super Wall
AND the Remote button will be enabled
AND the Displays button (and sub menu buttons) will be disabled
AND the Display Manager button will be disabled
AND the center source will be full screen

title: Super Wall - Active
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is has full screen view of the center monitor
AND taps on the Exit Super Wall button
custom_expected:
THEN the button will be disabled for a short time
AND the button text will change to Super Wall
AND the Remote button will be enabled
AND the Displays button (and sub menu buttons) will be enabled
AND the center source will be returned to PIP view

title: Activate Super Wall
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user sees all of the pips
AND taps on Super Wall
custom_expected: THEN the monitors from transition from all PIP to full screen of center monitor

title: Deactivate Super Wall
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user sees full screen of center monitor
AND taps on Exit Super Wall button
custom_expected: THEN the monitors from transition from full screen of center monitor to all PIP

title: Super Wall Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps on Super Wall or Exit Super Wall button
custom_expected:
THEN the button will grey out for a few seconds
AND the user will not be able to press during this time

title: Promote a PIP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks on a PIP
custom_expected:
THEN a user will see
BLUE for the selected PIP
GREEN if they can promote a PIP to that screen
RED if they can not promote a PIP to that screen

title: Swap PIP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps on middle row screen
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see
BLUE for the selected PIP
GREEN for the other two middle row screens
RED for the other PIP

title: Change Source of PIP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps: WHEN a user long presses a PIP
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the media guide
AND the user can switch the source

title: PIP Label - Small Screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
AND is on the main screen
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps on a PIP on top or bottom row
custom_expected:
THEN a grey banner will appear from the top
AND the text of the banner will be the source name

title: PIP Label - Big Screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
AND is on the main screen
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps on a PIP on center row
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see source name on the PIP
AND a grey banner will appear from the top
AND the text of the banner will be the source name

title: Media Guide
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user long presses a PIP
or navigates to a specific display from the menu
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a media guide

title: Menu Guide - Remote button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user long presses a PIP
or navigates to a specific display from the menu
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a floating Remote button in the top left
AND tapping on the Remote button will bring the user back to the homepage

title: Media Guide - Categories
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user long presses a PIP
or navigates to a specific display from the menu
AND is on the media guide
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the different categories
Favorites
MLB Clubs
Sports Networks
News
Entertainment
Miscellaneous

title: Media Guide - Categories
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user long presses a PIP
or navigates to a specific display from the menu
AND is on the media guide
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the different categories
Favorites (expanded by default)
MLB Clubs (expanded by default)
Sports Networks (expanded by default)
News (expanded by default)
Entertainment (expanded by default)
Miscellaneous (collapsed by default)

title: Media Guide - Logos
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps: WHEN a user is on the media guide
custom_expected: THEN the user should see logos for all channels and MLB clubs

title: Media Guide - Multiple Sources for One Channel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user has a selected PIP
AND is on the media guide
AND selects a channel with multiple sources (ESPN, AT&T Sportsnet, any MLB clubs)
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a popover
AND X
AND see logo
AND Please select a feed... text
AND see buttons for each source

title: Media Guide - Select a feed popover
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is selects a channel with multiple sources (ESPN, AT&T Sportsnet, any MLB clubs)
AND is on the Select a feed popover
AND when the user taps on the X
custom_expected:
THEN the popover is dismissed
AND the user should be on the media guide
AND PIP should still be in a selected state

title: Media Guide - Miscellaneous
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user long presses a PIP
or navigates to a specific display from the menu
AND is on the media guide
AND taps to expand Miscellaneous
AND taps on Clear button
custom_expected:
THEN the video (on all PIP) OR video/audio (on center PIP) will be cleared
AND the user will see a MLB logo on the display

title: Display Manager - Auto Populate
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps on the Menu button
AND taps on Display Manager
AND taps on Auto populate
custom_expected:
Then the MLB schedule for the day will be fetched
AND automatically assigned the sources to the PIP in displays 1, 2, 3, 7, 8, and 9

title: Display Manager - Auto Populate - Top Row
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps on the Menu button
AND taps on Display Manager
AND taps on Auto populate
custom_expected:
THEN all game feeds will be assigned to displays 1, 2, and 3
AND sorted by game time

title: Display Manager - Auto Populate- Bottom Left
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps on the Menu button
AND taps on Display Manager
AND taps on Auto populate
custom_expected:
THEN the home team’s center field source will be assigned to PiPs in display 7
AND sorted alphabetically by team (columnwise)

title: Display Manager - Auto Populate - Bottom Center
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps on the Menu button
AND taps on Display Manager
AND taps on Auto populate
custom_expected:
THEN the home team’s ballpark camera source will be assigned to PiPs in display 8
AND sorted alphabetically by team (columnwise)

title: Display Manager - Auto Populate - Bottom Right
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps on the Menu button
AND taps on Display Manager
AND taps on Auto populate
custom_expected:
THEN the home team’s high home source will be assigned to PiPs in display 9
AND sorted alphabetically by team (columnwise)

title: Display Manager - Auto Populate - StatsApi Integration
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps on the Menu button
AND taps on Display Manager
AND taps on Auto populate
custom_expected:
THEN all game feeds will be assigned to displays 1, 2, and 3
AND sorted by game time
AND the under monitor display UMD will appear like:

[away] @ [home] [start time] ([broadcast call sign])

title: Display Manager - Auto Populate - Game States
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps on the Menu button
AND the user uses the below POST call with specified date

{BACKEND_HOST}/api/v1/routes/auto-populate?layoutId=1&date={YYYY-MM-DD}

Check MLB.com for game states (Both type of doubleheaders, TBD games)
custom_expected: THEN the correct information will show for the game

title: Display Manager - Clear Display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps on the Menu button
AND taps on Display Manager
AND taps one display
custom_expected:
THEN the display will turn green
AND a red button labeled Clear Display appears

title: Display Manager - Clear Display Confirmation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps on the Menu button
AND taps on Display Manager
AND taps one or more displays
AND taps on Clear Display(s)
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a confirmation dialog
AND the text will be
-Clear sources for displays?
-You are about to clear the sources for all pips in the following display: "<number(s) corresponding to the selected display>". This action cannot be undone
-Cancel
-Continue

title: Display Manager - Clear Displays
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps on the Menu button
AND taps on Display Manager
AND taps one or more displays
AND taps on Clear Display(s) button
AND taps on Continue on the Confirmation dialogue
custom_expected:
THEN the selected display(s) will be cleared
AND the PIPs on those displays have MLB logo
AND non selected display(s) will not be cleared

title: Error - Disconnected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the home screen
AND unable to connect to our cloud services

-Device or browser may disconnect the app if the app has been in the background for a period of time
-Background system not running
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a red banner at the top that says Disconnected
AND should disappear once it connect is reestablished

title: Error - Unable to Route
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user routes a source to a PIP
AND a error occurs

**Dev can "lock" a PIP
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a red banner
AND An error has encountered during routing. message

title: Error - MAGNUM error
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN Matrix gets an error back from Evertz MAGNUM system
AND a user tries to assign a source to a PiP
OR promote a PiP
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a red banner
AND a A MAGNUM error has occurred message

title: Error - No Source for PIP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an iPad
AND held in landscape orientation
AND in Guided Access mode
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the homepage
AND taps on a PIP without a source
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a red banner
AND see a Selected PIP has no source. message

title: Confirm 200 Status Code, response is in JSON, Logo Image URL on GET /source/categories
